title: Ethnicity distribution of acting winners at the Academy Awards 1928 to 2015
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Awards for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities that are presented on the X-axis.
In Award Best Actress, White had the highest SOME LABEL 989.0 among the 2 groups and in Best Actress, Other Ethnicities had the lowest SOME LABEL 11.0.
In Award Best Actor, Other Ethnicities had the highest SOME LABEL among all 2 Awards and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Award Best Actress.
There is a gap of 57.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Other Ethnicities in Award Best Actor and Best Actress.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Awards for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities that are presented on the X-axis.
In Award Best Actress, White had the highest SOME LABEL 989.0 among the 2 groups and in Best Actress, Other Ethnicities had the lowest SOME LABEL 11.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Awards for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities that are presented on the X-axis.
In Award Best Actress, White had the highest SOME LABEL 989.0 among the 2 groups and in Best Actress, Other Ethnicities had the lowest SOME LABEL 11.0.
In Award Best Actor, Other Ethnicities had the highest SOME LABEL among all 2 Awards and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Award Best Actress.
There is a gap of 57.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Other Ethnicities in Award Best Actor and Best Actress.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Awards for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities that are presented on the X-axis.
Award Best Actress had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for White. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Award Best Actress for Other Ethnicities.
In Award Best Actor, Other Ethnicities had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Award Best Actress out of all 2 Awards.
Award Best Actor and Best Actress had the biggest gap of 57.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Other Ethnicities.
Among the groups, White had the biggest difference in SOME LABEL. Where the maximum SOME LABEL was 1.06 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL.
Averaging all 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities, the Award Best Actor is the maximum SOME LABEL and Best Actress is the minimum SOME LABEL.
